item.title: Operations Lead Engineer (OLER)
item.description: Responsibilities: Define and set development, test, release, update, and support processes for the product and service offerings. Implement and set up development, testing, automation tools, and IT infrastructure. Plan the team structure, activities, and participate in project management activities Monitor the processes during the entire lifecycle for its adherence and update or create new processes for improvement. Encourage and build automated processes wherever possible Evaluate / select / build and deploy appropriate CI/CD tools Requirements:
